verses.english: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Mu, Mun yi maka kyauta mai yawa.

verses.english: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].
verses.hausa: Saboda haka, ka yi salla dõmin Ubangijinka, kuma ka sõke (baiko, wato sukar raƙumi).

verses.english: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.
verses.hausa: Lalle mai aibanta ka shi ne mai yankakkiyar albarka.
